column2: User is able to login with username and password in the login page
Create backend database to store username password
Create UI for login page(2 input box and a login button)
User is able to upload excel file to database
Reading and extracting data from excel file into a json file
Format the raw json data uploaded by user to be more structures and organized
Handle inconsistencies of formating by creating an object that has all the default values that each attribute should be and then comparing the object with the data in json.
Handle duplicates by checking if an id of the row exists. If so update the row
Export data into an data sheet
